title: Imagine Operational Status and Updates Webpage
text: The Imagine documentation includes an article in the Introduction on the Status Page which shows you what you can see and subscribe to. The status page itself can be found on K3 Imagine - Status . The target uptime / availability of the Imagine platform is 99.95% excluding planned maintenance.
description:
The Imagine documentation includes an article in the Introduction on the Status Page which shows you what you can see and subscribe to. The status page itself can be found on K3 Imagine - Status .


The target uptime / availability of the Imagine platform is 99.95% excluding planned maintenance.

title: Webinar Recording - Overview of Imagine
text: This session was for Danish customers, but the majority is in English. It provides an in-depth look at K3 Imagine, showcasing how it can help you: Deliver seamless and consistent shopping experiences across digital and physical touchpoints Ensure customer satisfaction throughout every stage of the journey Achieve enhanced security with secure data storage and compliance with industry regulations Minimise risks with robust disaster recovery mechanisms
description:
This session was for Danish customers, but the majority is in English. It provides an in-depth look at K3 Imagine, showcasing how it can help you:

  • Deliver seamless and consistent shopping experiences across digital and physical touchpoints
  • Ensure customer satisfaction throughout every stage of the journey
  • Achieve enhanced security with secure data storage and compliance with industry regulations
  • Minimise risks with robust disaster recovery mechanisms

title: How to delete wrong stock-takes in Imagine
text: Navigate to Inventory / Stocktake Make the desired selection in date and branches Choose the status of which stock takes you want to clear. Press Submit In the result you can delete the Stock takes by pressing the BIN icon
description:
Navigate to Inventory / Stocktake


Make the desired selection in date and branches


Choose the status of which stock takes you want to clear.


Press Submit


In the result you can delete the Stock takes by pressing the BIN icon
